DOC.brief_summary: This study tested the hypothesis that vardenafil was both clinically effective and well-tolerated compared to placebo in men diagnosed as being unresponsive to sildenafil.
DOC.brief_title: Placebo-controlled Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Vardenafil in Subjects With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Men >/= 18 years of age, with 6 months or longer diagnosis of ED as defined by NIH Consensus statement, History of unresponsiveness to sildenafil Stable sexual relationship for > 6 month Primary hypoactive sexual desire History of myocardial infarction, stroke or lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month Nitrate therapy
